# GameMaker Studio 2 Project Files
# ---------------------------------
# Ignore temporary build files and caches generated by GameMaker
# These are typically created when running or building your project.
/.idea/                  # IDE configuration files (e.g., from IntelliJ IDEA)
/.vs/                    # Visual Studio related files (if integrated)
/build/                  # Output directory for compiled games
/tmp/                    # Temporary files
/temp/                   # Another common temporary directory
/datafiles_temp/         # Temporary files related to included files

# Ignore specific GameMaker generated files that are often user-specific or temporary
*.yy.log                 # Log files for .yy resources
*.yy.backup              # Backup files for .yy resources
*.yy.autosave            # Autosave files for .yy resources
*.yyp.log                # Log files for the main project file
*.yyp.backup             # Backup files for the main project file
*.yyp.autosave           # Autosave files for the main project file
*.resource_order         # This file stores the order of assets in the Asset Browser,
                         # which is usually a user-specific preference and can cause
                         # unnecessary conflicts if tracked.

# Operating System specific files
# ---------------------------------
# macOS specific files
.DS_Store                # Stores custom attributes of its containing folder (e.g., icon positions)
.AppleDouble             # Resource fork files on macOS
.LSOverride              # macOS specific override files

# Windows specific files
Thumbs.db                # Thumbnail cache file for Windows Explorer
ehthumbs.db              # Enhanced thumbnail cache for Windows
Desktop.ini              # Customization settings for folders
$RECYCLE.BIN/            # Windows Recycle Bin directory

# Common IDE/Editor specific files (if you use VS Code, Sublime Text, etc.)
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------
.vscode/                 # Visual Studio Code workspace settings
*.suo                    # Visual Studio Solution User Options file
*.user                   # Visual Studio user-specific project settings
*.config                 # Configuration files (often generated or local)
*.obj                    # Object files (intermediate compilation products)
*.pdb                    # Program Database files (for debugging)
*.ilk                    # Incremental Linker files
*.metaproj               # MSBuild meta-project files
*.resharper              # ReSharper (JetBrains) plugin files
*.bak                    # Generic backup files
*.scc                    # Source Code Control files (older systems)
*.vspscc                 # Visual Studio Source Control Project files
*.vssscc                 # Visual Studio Source Control Solution files
*.tmp                    # Generic temporary files
*.log                    # Generic log files

# Executables and compiled output (should not be version controlled)
# -----------------------------------------------------------------
*.exe                    # Windows executable files
*.dll                    # Dynamic Link Libraries (Windows)
*.lib                    # Library files
*.so                     # Shared Object files (Linux)
*.dylib                  # Dynamic Library files (macOS)
*.apk                    # Android application package
*.ipa                    # iOS application archive
*.xapk                   # Android application package (alternative format)
*.zip                    # Zip archives
*.rar                    # Rar archives
*.7z                     # 7-Zip archives
*.tar.gz                 # Tarball archives
*.dmg                    # macOS disk image
*.iso                    # Disk image files
*.bin                    # Binary files
*.dat                    # Data files
*.pak                    # Package files (often for game assets)

# GameMaker project export files (only track the source, not the exports)
*.yyz                    # GameMaker compressed project export
